round_best: Develop a meta-learning framework that trains a single, adaptable neural model capable of generating problem-specific heuristics for a variety of combinatorial optimization problems. This framework would utilize transfer learning and few-shot learning techniques to fine-tune the model on new problem types using minimal examples. By leveraging shared structures and similarities across different COPs, the model can quickly adapt to new problems, significantly reducing the need for individual model re-training.
